question: Defective electrical wiring that may lead to a fire is an example of a _________.
Which of the following is not a hazard?

options.A: Storing one ton of dynamite in a garage
options.B: Bad diet (eating lots of junk food)
options.D: Getting shot accidentally while deer hunting

question: Which of the following is a true statement?

options.A: Liability risks are risks associated with building calamities
options.C: Most individuals in the industrialized countries carry no insurance
options.D: The Law of Large Numbers is used in Risk Pooling

options.A: shifting the financial consequences of a loss to a third party
options.B: shifting the financial consequences of a loss to a self-insurance program
options.C: shifting the financial consequences of a loss to a well-diversified portfolio
options.D: shifting the financial consequences of a loss to wealthier group of people

question: Studies have shown that there is a relationship between demographic characteristics and risk tolerance. The following are the demographic characteristics, EXCEPT ____________.
